members.signatureBeforeChange: LRESULT wmNotify (NMHDR hdr, int wParam, int lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: LRESULT wmNotify (NMHDR hdr, int wParam, int lParam)
diff: +						* Bug in Windows.  When the first column of a table does not
+						* have an image and the user double clicks on the divider,
+						* Windows packs the column but does not take into account
+						* the empty space left for the image.  The fix is to measure
+						* each items ourselves rather than letting Windows do it.

members.signatureBeforeChange: LRESULT CDDS_ITEMPOSTPAINT (NMTVCUSTOMDRAW nmcd, int wParam, int lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: LRESULT CDDS_ITEMPOSTPAINT (NMTVCUSTOMDRAW nmcd, int wParam, int lParam)
